item.title: How we built this website in 3 hours
item.description: Spoiler alert: We did it using Hugo, a framework for building websites. Our goals were Minimmal to zero HTML,CSS and JS coding. Simple deployment. No dedicated CI tools. Integrated with git using Github or Bitbucket. No server or ssl management. Static site generator for simplicity, security & speed. Easy to update and roll back. Hosting requirements As easy and cheap as possible. Safe & reliable. Using this list we put out the question to our developer friends and Hugo was somewhere in the mix.
